post.author: oliver
post.title: Invalid Orchard Gallery URL
post.content:
In older installations of Orchard it’s possible that the URL for the Gallery feed is not up-to-date. The Orchard project site moved to Windows Azure at the end of 2011, and the Gallery URL changed in the process. It is now:

http://packages.orchardproject.net/FeedService.svc/

To change it, go to e.g. http://www.marinas.info/Packaging/Gallery/Sources, add a new feed with the above URL and delete the old one. That’s it! For more details visit the above mentioned post by Kris.

Happy Coding!
